results.title: Comparative effect of lisinopril and lacidipine on urinary albumin excretion in patients with type 11 diabetic nephropathy.
results.text_hl: Comparative effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_lacidipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C060285 @@@lacidipine@@@ on urinary albumin excretion in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Insulin_Dependent_11</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C563371 @@@type 11 diabetic nephropathy@@@.
